title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The sword depicted is a striking weapon characterized by its sleek, black blade and glowing golden accents. Its design blends elegance with a sense of power, featuring a circular emblem near the hilt that radiates light, suggesting a magical or ancient significance. This item likely possesses unique abilities or enhancements, making it a coveted artifact for players seeking strength and style in battle. The sharp, pointed tip and symmetrical design imply superior craftsmanship, while the contrasting colors create a visually appealing look. Ideal for both combat efficiency and aesthetic appreciation, this sword is a must-have for any adventurer.
